overview:
Will Gibney joined eCoast in 2000 as the seventh eCoast employee. Will brings over 10 years of technology Sales and Marketing experience to eCoast. Will has been a key engine in eCoast’s continued growth by forming new relationships and continually supporting our larger Fortune 500 client engagements. Will’s customer-focused approach has lead eCoast to expand our service offerings to become a full-service sales and marketing provider to multi-channel organizations. Will continues to focus exclusively at delivering quality solutions to our clients and ensuring their expectations are exceeded.

Before joining eCoast Will held sales roles at Sprint and Ecora software.

relationships.title: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
